MARVEL people??? I would like to get into Avengers but I am lost: New Avengers, Secret Avengers, Ultimate Avengers, Ultimates, new ultimates

New Avengers and Secret Avengers are just different factions of Avengers. They came about after certain Marvel events. I'd ignore anything to do with Ultimate since Ultimate = alternate storyline.
